parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description: The name of the namespace. This parameter is valid only after you set the Namespace and the ServiceAccount parameters.

parameters.name: ServiceAccount
parameters.description: The service account. This parameter is valid only after you set the Namespace and the ServiceAccount parameters.

parameters.name: TrustDomain
parameters.description: The trusted domain. Default value: cluster.local. This parameter is valid only after you set the Namespace and the ServiceAccount parameters.
